# ggplot2_colors
    
```{r function-ggplot2_colors}
#' ggplot2 colors
#' 
#' Reproduce a vector of colors like those from {ggplot2}
#' 
#' @param n number of colors needed
#'
#' @return vector of hexadecimal colors
#' 
#' @export
ggplot2_colors <- function(n) {
  hues = seq(15, 375, length = n + 1)
  hcl(h = hues, l = 65, c = 100)[1:n]
}
```
  
```{r example-ggplot2_colors}
ggplot2_colors(1)
```
  
```{r tests-ggplot2_colors}
test_that("ggplot2_colors works", {
  expect_true(inherits(ggplot2_colors, "function")) 
  expect_equal(object = ggplot2_colors(1),
               expected = c("#F8766D"))
})
```
  
# make_points_sf

  
```{r function-make_points_sf}
#' Make points_sf from "longitude" & "latitude" in a dataset
#' 
#' @noRd
make_points_sf <- function(data) {
  data |>
    dplyr::filter(!is.na(latitude) & !is.na(longitude)) |>
    sf::st_as_sf(
      coords = c("longitude", "latitude"),
      crs = 4326,
      remove = FALSE
    )
}
```

#'

    img_path <- system.file(complete_path,
  package = "esteem.overview"
)

short_path <- file.path(tempdir(), "plot.jpg")
file.copy(img_path, short_path, overwrite = TRUE)

return(short_path)
}
